ValidationRule.description: Prevents users from setting Creation Approval Status to Approved
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ISCHANGED(Creation_Approval_Status__c), NOT($User.Id="00550000005YQdR"), NOT($User.Id="00550000004PdIQ"), NOT($User.Id="0055000000760CW"),
OR( ISPICKVAL(Creation_Approval_Status__c, "Ops Approved"), ISPICKVAL(Creation_Approval_Status__c, "Ops Rejected") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only the Global Professional Services Operations Resource Manager can approve project creation.
